Uses of Package
com.stormpath.spring.security.provider

  • Packages that use com.stormpath.spring.security.provider 
    Package Description
    com.stormpath.spring.boot.autoconfigure  
    com.stormpath.spring.config  
    com.stormpath.spring.security.provider  
  • Classes in com.stormpath.spring.security.provider used by com.stormpath.spring.boot.autoconfigure 
    Class and Description
    AccountGrantedAuthorityResolver
    An AccountGrantedAuthorityResolver inspects a Stormpath Account and returns that Account's directly assigned GrantedAuthoritys.
    AccountPermissionResolver
    An AccountPermissionResolver inspects a Stormpath Account and returns that Account's directly assigned Permissions.
    AuthenticationTokenFactory
    Interface to be implemented as a factory for Authentication tokens.
    GroupGrantedAuthorityResolver
    A GroupGrantedAuthorityResolver inspects a Stormpath Group and returns that Group's assigned GrantedAuthoritys.
    GroupPermissionResolver
    A GroupPermissionResolver inspects a Stormpath Group and returns that Group's assigned Permissions.

    Class and Description

    AccountPermissionResolver

  • Classes in com.stormpath.spring.security.provider used by com.stormpath.spring.security.provider 
    Class and Description
    AccountGrantedAuthorityResolver
    An AccountGrantedAuthorityResolver inspects a Stormpath Account and returns that Account's directly assigned GrantedAuthoritys.
    AccountPermissionResolver
    An AccountPermissionResolver inspects a Stormpath Account and returns that Account's directly assigned Permissions.
    AuthenticationTokenFactory
    Interface to be implemented as a factory for Authentication tokens.
    CustomDataPermissionResolver
    A CustomDataPermissionResolver accesses a specific named field value of a CustomData resource that contains a Set&lt;String&gt; of Spring Security permission Strings.
    DefaultGroupGrantedAuthorityResolver.Mode 
    GroupGrantedAuthorityResolver
    A GroupGrantedAuthorityResolver inspects a Stormpath Group and returns that Group's assigned GrantedAuthoritys.
    GroupPermissionResolver
    A GroupPermissionResolver inspects a Stormpath Group and returns that Group's assigned Permissions.
    PermissionResolver
    A PermisisonResolver resolves a String value and converts it into a Permission instance.
